Summary: flashing white light that changed direction, speed of movement, and speed of flashes
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Panama City Beach
There were no other sightings in Panama City Beach on or around July 1st 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and two others where in our backyard talking at around 1 AM and one of us, T (I will refer to us as A, S, and T for our first names to remain anonymous.) T pointed to a flashing white light in the sky and we have been watching it since. It has been moving in an undefined path but has been staying in the same general area of the sky. The flashes have been getting faster and slower off and on. It goes from 1 flash per five seconds to 3 flashes per second. It has been moving around getting faster and slower. It has been going on for going on an hour and a half and is still flashing as I type. T said she thought it was shaped like a triangle, and me and S really can't tell.
